function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor ventilation due to HVAC system usage","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease propagation","Mitigation":"Improve ventilation and air quality through HVAC system maintenance","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV-C lights, HEPA filters","People":"Occupants, building users","Owner":"Building management, HVAC maintenance personnel"},{"Description":"Altered use and occupation habits leading to potential clustering of people","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement social distancing measures, staggered scheduling, and use of barriers","Technologies":"Occupancy sensors, room booking systems, physical barriers","People":"Building occupants, facility managers","Owner":"Building management, facility management"}]}
